name: federation-to-stitching-sdl
description: This utility converts an [Apollo Federation SDL](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/federation/federation-spec/) string into a [Schema Stitching SDL](https://www.graphql-tools.com/docs/stitch-directives-sdl/) string. Schema Stitching supports freeform service bindings that may integrate with any GraphQL query, including the `_entities` query setup by [Federation services](https://github.com/apollographql/federation). That means any Federation SDL may be converted and plugged into a Schema Stitching gateway. For example...
